comment: ` _i ` is a complex number. Axiom 3 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory. This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly; instead, use ~ ax-icn . (Contributed by NM, 23-Feb-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)
